评论详情: Beautiful dress that I bought as a gift for my granddaughter, however after wearing the dress for about 30 minutes the zipper separated.
My daughter picked this for her 1st homecoming dress. We love how it turned out! Was a great fit and looked better than I was expecting. The most important thing was she loved it!
My daughter loves it.

评论概述: Very pretty style but cheap fabric
评论详情: I purchased this dress for my teen daughter for a school dance. When it arrived I was instantly disappointed in the fabric quality. The style and fit were perfect, however, it looked cheap due to the fabric quality so I returned it.
Lovely dress. True to color and true to size. Well stitched. Exactly as pictured. Can wear it "as is" or dress it up even more. Very happy with it.
I bought this for my friend for her birthday and she described it as perfect and it’s exactly what she expected. She purchased a purple in small. The quality is tea !

Absolutely love the purple color and comfort of this dress. Wish the ties were already Installed for me though lol The webbing on the skirt is very fragile and easy to get hung up on things, but I would definitely buy it again!
The dress got well in her and looked amazing
My tween daughter wore this for her middle school homecoming dance. She felt so beautiful in this dress. She loved this dress so much, she wore it again for Halloween

评论概述: Amazing dress for price! Perfect fit.
评论详情: Loved this dress! It fitted perfectly and looked beautiful. Just don’t iron it without using some fabric in between. Not the best quality (should be obvious at this price), but great value for money. Great flexible, stretchy fabric. Color is beautiful too! Looked great with some lacey tights.
Size ran true to size and the material isn’t bad. I would have preferred it a little heavier but all and all good for the price.
I love this dress. It's beautiful.

评论概述: I've gotten a lot of compliments while wearing this.
评论详情: I really like it. Highly recommend.

Beautiful dress, but seller clearly doesn't pay attention to detail. I ordered an xl and received medium, and even if I reordered and returned it for the right size it wouldn't be here by the time I needed it. So I'm stuck with a dress that is to small and nothing to wear for my cousin's wedding.

评论概述: Fabric at the waist looks cheap
评论详情: The fabric where the lace parts are beautiful, the waist looks so cheap. Tragic really, luckily I have a wide belt.

评论概述: Perfect fit and exactly like description
评论详情: My daughter bought this for her homecoming and it fit perfectly and she loves it
The dress itself is beautiful how the strap broke before i even fully tried on the dress. The dress itself is very gorgeous and fits well according to size however the strap is made cheaply
The corset ribbon was not prethread and did not have instructions on how to weave them. The straps are also listed as adjustable they arnt they are just elastic so they stretch

评论概述: Looked way different than the picture
评论详情: The corset wasn't sewn in, it came as ribbons that had to be woven in and out of the little holes. It was extremely wrinkled due to the way it was packaged, which made ironing it a tough time. Also the see through flowers couldn't be ironed due to the fabric of it so it laid over the polyester underneath in a weird way. It's a beautiful dress in the picture, but it looked nothing like that upon arrival. It was only $40 so ig you get what you pay for
I Look like a little princess 🥰
I got this dress for Halloween, but it's so attractive and comfortable that I think I'll wear it for other occasions, too!

It looks like the pictures, however some of the pictures it looks like there are two straps on each shoulder. There isn't, they are definitely only one single strap as seen in the other photos. Anything to know before ordering is the red layer is in fact a layer. You can't tell in the pictures that there are in fact two layers the red layer and the black layer. Would definitely recommend. I will say that the person, not me, wearing the dress is 5' 7.5" tall wide hips and is barely a 32 B cup. She also can wear a 00-3 in jeans and dresses. It fits her perfectly. We were worried since all the other reviews the purchasers we 5'5" and under. Worth money, looks fantastic, the fabric is a good fabric, and it is a little stretchy. I hope this review helps.

This fit perfectly, the picture doesn’t do it justice, so beautiful, it’s amazing quality, super comfortable and I’m so glad I bought this. You get more than you pay for with it. 10/10 will buy again in a different color

评论概述: Very cute and stylish! However not $40 quality
评论详情: I bought this dress to wear to my high school graduation, It very comfy and very cute on the body. Yet I’m disappointed the quality was not as expected. The straps are thin ribbon like material that feels like with enough pull it could snap. There were loose threads in the floral pattern and the pice is cheaply made giving me the the impression of an almost costume like dress. I am still going to wear it because the colors are pretty and flattering on the body but overall the dress is not worth the price
Fits nicely thank you 😊
Love the style. Great date night dress.

I purchased the dress for a vampire masquerade themed birthday party. The dress was comfortable to wear, not itchy or nor irritating. Loved the high-low cut of the skirt, and the bust fit well. The dress was true to size.
I wear a crop top under it to be more modest. It's very comfortable and fits well.
Si vous prenez vos mensuration les taille sont parfaites!! J’ai pris une larges et tout était nickel!

J' ai commandé cette robe pour mon party de Noël et je ne suis pas déçue! Tout d'abord la taille est parfaite (xxl). La coupe est comme sur la photo! Même chose pour la couleur. Le bas est un peu froissé mais ce n'est pas grave! Un petit peu de vapeur et le tour est joué! Délai de livraison rapide! Je recommande vivement!
The dress is so cute and arrived quickly. The only downside was when someone packed it, the plastic zipper of the bag caught part of the lace so it did tear a little.
